name: BLACK HOLE VISUALIZER
desc: Simulates the bending of light around a black hole. Partially inspired by the images of the M87 supermassive black hole taken in April of 2019.

name: XOR CRYPTOSYSTEM
desc: XOR encryption/decryption using the digest of a custom hash algorithm for the "key". This is simply an experiment, and should not be used to protect actual sensitive information from actual attackers.

name: 2D LAGRANGIAN FLUID SIMULATION - CHEMICALS
desc: Uses a technique inspired by SPH to simulate fluids of multiple types, each with randomly determined chemical and physical properties.

name: 2D LAGRANGIAN FLUID SIMULATION - GRAVITY
desc: Uses the Barnes-Hut algorithm together with a technique inspired by MPM to simulate a fluid moving under the influence of its own gravity.

name: 2D EULERIAN FLUID SIMULATION - WATER
desc: A grid-based fluid simulation with momentum and surface tension.

name: 2D EULERIAN FLUID SIMULATION - FIRE
desc: A grid-based fluid simulation running on the GPU. Essentially an implementation of this: https://developer.download.nvidia.com/books/HTML/gpugems/gpugems_ch38.html

name: 2D SCHRODINGER EQUATION SIMULATION
desc: My take on modeling the effect of gravity on wavelets evolving according to the Schrodinger equation on a wrapping 2D surface.

name: ALPHABET EXPLOSION
desc: A very simple app demonstrating Processing's Android mode.

name: CIRCADIAN TETRIS
desc: The player doesn't clear pieces directly, but rather waits for when the pieces and spaces invert periodically.
